Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Troy in 1974...
Had first career hit (double) on 8/20/1974, off Pablo Chaidez (PON)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/14/1974, off Bones Hathaway (CC)...
Drove in 6 runs against Longport on 7/31/1975...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Diablo on 4/18/1981...
Injured on 4/27/1981 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1984, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Toledo on 2/6/1985 to a 4-year deal worth $6,666,000 per year...
